00001 #include "SimpleMapper.h"
00002 #include "ModuleType.h"
00003 
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <fstream>
00006 #include <string>
00007 
00008 #define AHCAL_MAX_LAYERS 38
00009 
00010 SimpleMapper::SimpleMapper( std::string configFileName)
00011 {
00012   
00013   // the input stream for the text file
00014   std::fstream configFileInputStream;
00015   configFileInputStream.open(configFileName.c_str());
00016 
00017   // the input buffer for the line we just read
00018   std::string inputLine;
00019 
00020   // parse the text file line by line
00021   while ( std::getline( configFileInputStream, inputLine ) )
00022   {
00023     // std::cout << "DEBUG: Read " << inputLine << std::endl;
00024     
00025     // skip comment lines
00026     if ( inputLine.find("#") != std::string::npos ) 
00027     {
00028       // If there is no # the return value is npos.
00029       // So if it is not npos there is a # -> skip this line
00030       // std::cout << "skipped comment line" << std::endl;
00031       continue;
00032     }
00033     
00034     // the input variables to be read from the string
00035     int slotConf     = -1;
00036     int feConf       = -1;
00037     int moduleConf   = -1;
00038     int stackPos     = -1;
00039     int cmbId        = -1;
00040     int cmbCanAdr    = -1;
00041     int cmbPinId     = -1;
00042     int Hold_ext     = -1;
00043     int Hold_CM_LED  = -1;
00044     int Hold_PM_LED  = -1;
00045     int Vcalib_CM    = -1;
00046     int Vcalib_PM    = -1;
00047     int tcmt         = -1;
00048 
00049     // use sscanf to scan for the pattern. It is the line containing AHCAL.
00050     int nParametersRead = sscanf( inputLine.c_str(), " %d %d AHCAL8 %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d",
00051                                   &slotConf, &feConf, &moduleConf, &stackPos, 
00052                                   &cmbId, &cmbCanAdr, &cmbPinId, &Hold_ext, &Hold_CM_LED, 
00053                                   &Hold_PM_LED, &Vcalib_CM, &Vcalib_PM);
00054 
00055     unsigned int  moduleType(0);
00056     bool validConfig = false;
00057 
00058     if ( nParametersRead != 12 )
00059     {
00060       nParametersRead = sscanf( inputLine.c_str(), " %d %d AHCAL %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d",
00061                                 &slotConf, &feConf, &moduleConf, &stackPos, 
00062                                 &cmbId, &cmbCanAdr, &cmbPinId, &Hold_ext, &Hold_CM_LED, 
00063                                 &Hold_PM_LED, &Vcalib_CM, &Vcalib_PM);
00064 
00065       if ( nParametersRead != 12 )
00066       {
00067         
00068         nParametersRead = sscanf( inputLine.c_str(), " %d %d TCMT  DAC_tcmt%d.dat %d %d %d %d %d",
00069                                   &slotConf, &feConf, &tcmt, &Hold_ext, &Hold_CM_LED, 
00070                                   &Hold_PM_LED, &Vcalib_CM, &Vcalib_PM);
00071 
00072         if ( nParametersRead == 8 )
00073         {
00074           moduleType = ModuleType::TCMT;
00075           validConfig=true;
00076           moduleConf=AHCAL_MAX_LAYERS + tcmt;
00077           stackPos=AHCAL_MAX_LAYERS + tcmt;
00078         }
00079         else
00080         {
00081           //std::cout << "Unknown line "  << inputLine << std::endl;
00082         }
00083       }
00084       else //scanf ahc == 12
00085       {
00086         moduleType = ModuleType::AHC;
00087         validConfig=true;
00088       }
00089     }
00090     else  //scanf ahc== 12
00091     {
00092       moduleType = ModuleType::AHC8;
00093       validConfig=true;
00094     }
00095  
00096    // if the number of parameters is 12 as expected fill the map
00097     if ( validConfig )
00098     {
00099       // std::cout << " there we are:" << slotConf << "\t" << feConf << "\t" 
00100       // << moduleConf << "\t" << stackPos << std::endl;
00101       _sf2mlMap[ SlotFrontendID( slotConf, feConf ) ] 
00102         = ModuleDescription ( moduleConf, stackPos, moduleType); 
00103     }
00104 
00105   }
00106 
00107   configFileInputStream.close();
00108   
00109 }
00110 
00111 void SimpleMapper::print()
00112 {
00113   std::cout << "# slot frontEnd module layer type" << std::endl;
00114   for ( std::map< SlotFrontendID, ModuleDescription >::iterator it = _sf2mlMap.begin();
00115         it != _sf2mlMap.end(); it++ )
00116   {
00117     SlotFrontendID sfID = it->first;
00118     ModuleDescription moduleDesc = it->second;
00119     
00120     std::cout << sfID.first  <<  "\t" << sfID.second  << "\t" 
00121               << moduleDesc._module <<  "\t" << moduleDesc._layer <<  "\t";
00122     switch ( moduleDesc._moduleType )
00123     {
00124       case ModuleType::AHC: std::cout << "AHC";
00125         break;
00126       case  ModuleType::AHC8: std::cout << "AHC8";
00127         break;
00128       case  ModuleType::TCMT: std:: cout << "TCMT";
00129         break;
00130     }
00131     std::cout << std::endl;
00132   }
00133 }
00134 
00135 SimpleMapper::ModuleLayerID SimpleMapper::getModuleLayerID( SimpleMapper::SlotFrontendID sfID )
00136 {
00137   return ModuleLayerID( _sf2mlMap[sfID]._module, _sf2mlMap[sfID]._layer);
00138 }

00140 
00141 bool SimpleMapper::isAHC8( SimpleMapper::SlotFrontendID sfID )
00142 {
00143   return ( _sf2mlMap[sfID]._moduleType ==  ModuleType::AHC8 );
00144 }
00145 
00146 bool SimpleMapper::isTCMT( SimpleMapper::SlotFrontendID sfID )
00147 {
00148   return ( _sf2mlMap[sfID]._moduleType ==  ModuleType::TCMT );
00149 }
00150 
00151 SimpleMapper::ModuleDescription::ModuleDescription( int module, int layer,
00152                                                     unsigned int moduleType ) 
00153   : _module( module ), _layer( layer), _moduleType( moduleType ) 
00154 {}
00155 
00156 unsigned int SimpleMapper::getModuleType( SimpleMapper::SlotFrontendID sfID )
00157 {
00158   return _sf2mlMap[sfID]._moduleType;
